def main():
    n, x = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = [[None for _ in [0] * n] for _ in [0] * n]
    for i in range(n):
        m = a[i]
        for j in range(n):
            k = i - j
            if k <0:
                k +=n
            m = min(m, a[k])
            b[j][i] = m
    m = 1e15
    for i, j in enumerate(b):
        m = min(m, sum(j) + x*i)
    print(m)

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {

    // First part:

    int n, x;

    scanf("%d %d", &n, &x);

    int a[n];

    for (int i=0; i<n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]);

    int b[n][n];

    for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {

        int m = a[i];

        for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {

            int k = i - j;

            if (k <0) k +=n;

            m = (m < a[k]) ? m : a[k];

            b[j][i] = m;

        }

    }

    int m_min = 1e15;

    for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {

        int sum_row =0;

        for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {

            sum_row += b[i][j];

        }

        int total = sum_row + x * i;

        if (total < m_min) m_min = total;

    }

    // Second part:

    char m_str[20];

    sprintf(m_str, "%d", m_min);

    int num_g =0, num_p=0, score=0;

    for (int i=0; m_str[i] != '\0'; i++) {

        char c = m_str[i];

        if (c == 'g') {

            if (num_g - num_p >0) {

                score +=1;

                num_p +=1;

            } else {

                num_g +=1;

            }

        } else if (c == 'p') {

            if (num_g - num_p >0) {

                num_p +=1;

            } else {

                score -=1;

                num_g +=1;

            }

        }

    }

    // Third part:

    char score_str[20];

    sprintf(score_str, "%d", score);

    int has_A =0, has_B=0;

    for (int i=0; score_str[i] != '\0'; i++) {

        if (score_str[i] == 'A') has_A =1;

        if (score_str[i] == 'B') has_B =1;

    }

    printf("%s\n", (has_A && has_B) ? "Yes" : "No");

    return 0;

}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {

    int n, x;

    scanf("%d %d", &n, &x);

    int a[n];

    for (int i=0; i<n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]);

    int b[n][n];

    for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {

        int m = a[i];

        for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {

            int k = i - j;

            if (k <0) k +=n;

            m = (m < a[k]) ? m : a[k];

            b[j][i] = m;

        }

    }

    long long m_min = 1000000000000000LL; // 1e15

    for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {

        long long sum_row =0;

        for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {

            sum_row += b[i][j];

        }

        long long total = sum_row + (long long)x * i;

        if (total < m_min) m_min = total;

    }

    // ... rest of the code as before, but now m_min is a long long.

    // Second part:

    char m_str[20];

    // Need to print m_min as a string. Since it's a long long, use %lld.

    // ... rest of the code.

    // Third part:

    // ... same as before.

    return 0;

}
